skill.name: treatment-plans
skill.description: Generate concise (3-4 page), focused medical treatment plans in LaTeX/PDF format for all clinical specialties. Supports general medical treatment, rehabilitation therapy, mental health care, chronic disease management, perioperative care, and pain management. Includes SMART goal frameworks, evidence-based interventions with minimal text citations, regulatory compliance (HIPAA), and professional formatting. Prioritizes brevity and clinical actionability.
skill.summary: Generate concise (3-4 page), focused medical treatment plans in LaTeX/PDF format for all clinical sp...
skill.author: K-Dense-AI

security_audit.summary: All 512 static findings are FALSE POSITIVES. This is a legitimate medical treatment plan documentation skill. The static scanner incorrectly triggers on LaTeX package declarations (flagged as 'weak crypto'), medical terminology like 'system' (flagged as 'reconnaissance'), and markdown backticks (flagged as 'shell execution'). No malicious code, network access, credential handling, or exfiltration patterns exist. The skill only generates LaTeX templates and runs local validation scripts.

content.value_statement: Generate professional medical treatment plans in LaTeX format for any clinical specialty. Includes HIPAA compliance guidance, SMART goal frameworks, and validation tools for patient-centered care documentation.
actual_capabilities: Generate 7 treatment plan types including general medical, rehabilitation, mental health, chronic disease, perioperative care, and pain management
Create one-page concise treatment plans (preferred format) or detailed 3-4 page plans
Apply SMART goal frameworks with evidence-based intervention guidelines
Validate treatment plans for completeness, compliance, and quality standards
Generate treatment timelines and schedules with visual formatting
Ensure HIPAA compliance with de-identification guidance for 18 PHI identifiers
limitations: Requires LaTeX compiler (pdflatex, xelatex) to generate final PDF output
Templates require manual customization with patient-specific information
Does not provide medical advice or clinical decision support
Does not integrate with electronic health record (EHR) systems

use_cases.title: Chronic Disease Management
use_cases.description: Create structured diabetes, hypertension, or heart failure management plans with measurable goals and monitoring schedules.

use_cases.title: Rehabilitation Programs
use_cases.description: Design physical therapy and occupational therapy plans with functional restoration milestones and timeline progressions.

use_cases.title: Psychiatric Treatment Plans
use_cases.description: Document mental health treatment goals, therapy interventions, and safety monitoring for depression, anxiety, or PTSD.

prompt_templates.title: Basic Treatment Plan
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a general medical treatment plan for a 55-year-old patient with Type 2 diabetes. Include SMART goals for blood sugar management, metformin prescription details, dietary intervention, and monitoring schedule.

prompt_templates.title: Rehabilitation Plan
prompt_templates.prompt: Generate a rehabilitation treatment plan for a 65-year-old patient recovering from stroke. Include physical therapy milestones, occupational therapy goals, and 12-week timeline with expected outcomes.

prompt_templates.title: Pain Management
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a multimodal pain management plan for a 45-year-old patient with chronic lower back pain. Include opioid-sparing strategies, physical therapy requirements, and monthly monitoring parameters.

prompt_templates.title: Surgical Care Pathway
prompt_templates.prompt: Generate a perioperative care plan for a 70-year-old patient scheduled for hip replacement surgery. Include preoperative optimization, ERAS protocol compliance, and postoperative recovery milestones.

output_examples.input: Create a mental health treatment plan for a 35-year-old patient with major depressive disorder
output: Treatment Goals: Reduce PHQ-9 score by 50% within 8 weeks (Specific, Measurable)
Interventions: CBT weekly sessions, SSRI medication management, sleep hygiene protocol
Monitoring: PHQ-9 every 2 weeks, side effect assessment weekly
Safety: Emergency contact protocol, suicide risk assessment criteria

output_examples.input: Generate a rehabilitation plan for post-knee replacement surgery
output: Functional Goals: Achieve 90-degree knee flexion by week 4, 120-degree by week 8
PT Schedule: 3x/week for 6 weeks, daily home exercises
Milestones: Ambulate with cane at 2 weeks, stairs at 4 weeks, return to activities at 12 weeks
Safety Precautions: Weight-bearing limits, incision care, warning signs for infection

output_examples.input: Create a chronic disease management plan for hypertension
output: BP Goal: Reduce systolic BP to <130 mmHg within 3 months
Medications: Lisinopril 10mg daily, with titration schedule
Lifestyle: DASH diet, 30 minutes daily exercise, sodium restriction <1500mg
Monitoring: Home BP logging weekly, lab work quarterly

best_practices: Start with the one-page treatment plan format for most clinical scenarios to ensure conciseness
Always include measurable outcomes with specific timeframes for goal tracking
Validate your completed plan using the validate_treatment_plan.py script before finalizing
anti_patterns: Avoid including identifiable patient information (use de-identified codes instead of names)
Do not skip the monitoring and safety sections even for routine cases
Avoid excessive citations - focus on clinical actionability over bibliographic completeness

faq.question: Do I need LaTeX installed to use this skill?
faq.answer: Yes, a LaTeX distribution like TeX Live or MiKTeX is required to compile .tex files to PDF.

faq.question: Are these treatment plans legally binding?
faq.answer: No, these are documentation templates. Always follow your institution's policies and local regulations.

faq.question: Can I use this for pediatric patients?
faq.answer: Yes, but adapt goals and interventions for age-appropriate considerations and guardian involvement.

faq.question: How do I ensure HIPAA compliance?
faq.answer: Use de-identification guidelines in regulatory_compliance.md. Remove all 18 PHI identifiers before sharing.

faq.question: What clinical guidelines are built in?
faq.answer: Templates incorporate evidence-based intervention guidelines, SMART goal frameworks, and specialty-specific protocols.

faq.question: Can I customize the templates?
faq.answer: Yes, all LaTeX templates are fully customizable. Modify sections, colors, and formatting to match your institution's standards.
